CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 Top-gate OFETs based on this PDI- dithienothiophene copolymer exhibited a saturation electron mobility ( μ e ) of 6 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , current on / off ratio ( I on / I off ) of 10^4 , and a low threshold voltage ( V th ) of 7 V in air.

Let's think step by step.
1. PDI-dithienothiophene copolymer: This is the name of the material used in the top-gate OFETs. Therefore, it is the Material Name entity in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 5 Top-gate OFETs based on this PDI- dithienothiophene copolymer exhibited a saturation electron mobility ( μ e ) of 6 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , current on / off ratio ( I on / I off ) of 10^4 , and a low threshold voltage ( V th ) of 7 V in air.

Let's think step by step.

1. Top-gate OFETs: This is a type of Organic Field-Effect Transistor (OFET). "Top-gate" refers to the configuration of the gate electrode being on top of the channel region.
2. PDI-dithienothiophene copolymer: This is a specific type of organic material used in the fabrication of the OFETs.
3. Saturation electron mobility (μe): This is a property that describes how easily electrons can move through the material when a high electric field is applied.
4. Current on / off ratio (Ion / Ioff): This is a property that describes the ability of the transistor to switch between conducting and insulating states. A high ratio indicates good switching performance.
5. Electrons: These are subatomic particles that carry a negative charge.
6. Vth: This is the voltage threshold, which is the minimum voltage required to start the flow of current through the transistor.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PDI-dithienothiophene copolymer: This is a specific organic material.
2. Saturation electron mobility (μe): This is a material property that describes how easily electrons can move through the material when a high electric field is applied.
3. Current on / off ratio (Ion / Ioff): This is a material property that describes the ability of the material to switch between conducting and insulating states.
4. Threshold voltage (Vth): This is a material property that describes the minimum voltage required to start the flow of current through the material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Saturation electron mobility (μe) |
| Current on / off ratio (Ion / Ioff) |
| Threshold voltage (Vth) |
| PDI-dithienothiophene copolymer |
